Articles.Content:
Version 0.18.3 DEMO

Have you ever try precision landing 5+5 Kerbal on Mun with just 2 launch?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Ok. Here are the story.

The 1st day my PC install with the KSP, I was like, wow, that was the game that I'm looking for ages.

So,

1st I've learn to launch rocket. (via Tutorial)

2nd I've learn to orbit. (via Tutorial)

3rd I've learn to go to Mun. (via Tutorial)

4th I've build my own rocket. Launch to the Kerbin orbit. Figure out the minimum orbit high 70km.

5th I've learn to parachute decent back to Kerbin.

6th I've learn to putting 2 crews in 1 launch. (Demo remember?)

7th I've landed on Mun.

8th I've landed on Mun with multiple crews.

9th I've done precision landing on Mun.

10th I've build a 5 crews Mun rocket. Launch it and land it.

11th I've done precision landing with that rocket again. (As per above).

12th I brought the game. KSP 0.20. (Play till now.)
